name: Lost In Time (itch) (HypeFury, gelis07)
description:
Help the poor man who got lost in time and now needs to collect all of his time machine parts to get back to the present! Only you can guide him to his marvelous creation!

Use A, D to move right and left. 

Press W to jump.

Left Click to shoot.

This game was made by HypeFury, Gelis 07, and DavidDevsDumbStuff.

Note: If  WebGL does not work, just download the windows version. If you get any errors in the WebGL just clear it.

Note: When you download the exe file you browser might say that it has dangerous things in it but we assure you we have no dangerous things just click on the arrow and click keep.
